border-dark.$description: Dividing / Separating Lines, Accordion Section Divider

border-light.$description: Dividing / Separating Lines, Accordion Content Divider, inactive borders

warning.$description: Background color only! /Toast message with black text

icon-light.$description: Icon Color on light background (white/blue) / used for input validation

surface-brand.$description: Background for navigation and other decorative elements

text-disabled-light.$description: Labels for disabled elements (on darker background)

text-inverted.$description: Button labels, badge labels, menu items
